channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: No work taking place, 16th December
item.description:
The roadworks began last Saturday, allegedly a telecomms emergency. Since then I have seen NO WORKING at all. There is a hole in the road, temporary traffic lights and that's it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 73, Ermin Street, Brockworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pot hole can't be avoided by cars due to narrow road, 16th December
item.description:
Next to the green utility box in Bethesda Road on the left as you leave the Bath Road car park. Someone had put in cone in it but the cone has been flattened as there isn't enough room to avoid the cone/pothole as it is a single road due to parked cars. Cars are mounting the pavement to avoid it. Also it is a hazard for cyclists. This pot hole has been reported multiple time since Nov. This pothole regularly appears here. The patching just doesn't last. You have the heavy recycling lorries coming along this road which adds pressure to the edges of the road. Please fix it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Bethesda Street, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep cracking and subsidence, 16th December
item.description:
The problem is along most of Copse Green Lane, with parts that have subsided to an extent that it kicks the car sideways whilst going over it. The issue has built during the dry summer and we worry that frosts may exacerbate the problem if not remedied

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large deep pothole, 16th December
item.description:
Heading away from chosen hill school there is a deep pothole which goes down to the base layer if the road. If a cyclist hit this then it would cause a terrible accident as it's on a downhill stretch just before a bend.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brookfield Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Repair lasted 36 hours, 16th December
item.description:
Drain cover outside 52 Cheltenham Road East was repaired at 8.50pm on 14/12/25 and is already back to being faulty, loose and rattling every time a car drives over it. This is unbearable for local residents and has been going on since 21/10/25 when it was installed by Cheltenham Surfacing on behalf of Montells on behalf of the Highways!!!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drains, 16th December
item.description:
The drain outside Bella Vista is Blocked. There are 4 drains that are in this area 2 outside Bella Vista , 1 that works and the other is very slow. Over the other side outside Colimace the situation is similar with one working and the other one that is blocked. The condition has been like this for some time exacerbated by the autumn leaves which I endeavour to clear on a regular basis but they really do need attention especially as one of the basement flats was flooded recently after some particularly heavy rain
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St Anne's Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
